value.title: Tesla backs vision-only approach to autonomy using powerful supercomputer
value.excerpt: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has been teasing a neural network training computer called ‘Dojo’ since at least 2019. Musk says Dojo will be able to process vast amounts of video data to achieve vision-only autonomous driving.

value.title: EU data protection agencies want ban on AI facial recognition
value.excerpt: European Union's data protection agencies called for a  ban on use of artificial intelligence (AI) to identify people in public places. value.title: EU Privacy Watchdogs Call for Ban on Facial Recognition in Public Spaces
value.excerpt: Europe's two privacy watchdogs teamed up on Monday to call for a ban on the use of facial recognition in public spaces, going against draft European Union rules which would allow the technology to be used for public security reasons.

value.title: EU Data Watchdogs Call for Ban on Facial Recognition Through AI
value.excerpt: European Union data protection watchdogs called for a “general ban” on any use of artificial intelligence to identify people in public spaces warning of the “extremely high risks” to people’s privacy.

value.title: Mojo Vision’s Smart Contact Lens Could Be Transformative For Sight Impaired
value.excerpt: Mojo Vision, a California-based startup, is developing an electronic contact lens that can digitally enhance what the wearer sees. The company intends for Mojo Lens’ initial application to be as an assistive device to help people with sight impairments see the world in an entirely new way.
